rules_text:
Primal {5}{W}{B} [i](During your turn, you may cast this spell for {5}{W}{B} instead of playing a land.)[/i]
Destroy all creatures. If this spell was cast for its primal cost, for each player, put up to one creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
[i]“This world's an ugly place, but you're so beautiful...”
—Lysander, to Remi[/i]
